data.event: They built Fort Mecoponacka in 1641 to defend the settlement.
On October 27, the ship Welcome arrived at the town, bearing William Penn on his first visit to the province.

In 1789, the city became the county seat for the newly created Delaware County (whereupon Chester County became landlocked, with West Chester as its county seat), but the county seat was moved to the borough of Media in 1851.

event.title: was moved to the borough of Media in 1851
